job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Software Engineer, Frontend, Marketing Enablement
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join us on the Marketing Enablement Frontend team to help us achieve an ambitious vision for our Marketing Orchestration Product Group.

   The Marketing Enablement Frontend Team is responsible for making marketers work better, together. Our team builds user-facing products that span across HubSpot's entire Marketing Hub, such as Marketing Campaigns, interactive commenting, task management and so much more. With these tools, marketers can demonstrate their success to their teams and managers, and iterate to keep improving.

   As a Senior Frontend Engineer on this team, you will:
     * Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
     * Envision, build and analyse new features and tools, each contributing to company growth and revenue
     * Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
     * Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
     * Help HubSpot users meet their goals, via changes you've made
     * Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
     * Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer, Frontend, Marketing Enablement

We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join us on the Marketing Enablement Frontend team to help us achieve an ambitious vision for our Marketing Orchestration Product Group.

   The Marketing Enablement Frontend Team is responsible for making marketers work better, together. Our team builds user-facing products that span across HubSpot's entire Marketing Hub, such as Marketing Campaigns, interactive commenting, task management and so much more. With these tools, marketers can demonstrate their success to their teams and managers, and iterate to keep improving.

   As a Senior Frontend Engineer on this team, you will:
     * Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
     * Envision, build and analyse new features and tools, each contributing to company growth and revenue
     * Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
     * Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
     * Help HubSpot users meet their goals, via changes you've made
     * Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
     * Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on frontend software engineering for marketing enablement tools. While it mentions user-facing products and business impact, it lacks specific details about AI/ML model development, training, or deployment, which are central to ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. The role appears to be a traditional software engineering position focused on product development within a marketing context, rather than a specialized AI/ML role.

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions 'Senior Software Engineer', 'write and ship production code', 'build user-facing products', and 'build and analyse new features and tools', which are core software development activities.
The description states 'build user-facing products', indicating the development of applications that end-users interact with.
The phrase 'Envision, build and analyse new features and tools' directly relates to the software development lifecycle of creating and improving product functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: Envision, build and analyse new features and tools

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding the 'ambitious vision for our Marketing Orchestration Product Group' and how the team's work 'spans across HubSpot's entire Marketing Hub', indicating a need to grasp the business context of marketing tools.
job_tasks.phrase: achieve an ambitious vision for our Marketing Orchestration Product Group

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions that the tools help 'marketers can demonstrate their success to their teams and managers, and iterate to keep improving', showing an understanding of business goals and user needs within marketing.
job_tasks.phrase: marketers can demonstrate their success to their teams and managers, and iterate to keep improving

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'contributing to company growth and revenue' directly links the engineering work to business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: contributing to company growth and revenue

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Help HubSpot users meet their goals, via changes you've made' implies understanding user needs and business objectives from the user's perspective.
job_tasks.phrase: Help HubSpot users meet their goals

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience' shows a focus on understanding business impact through user data.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business' directly indicates a requirement for understanding the business operations.
job_tasks.phrase: Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business

soft_skills.phrase: Envision, build and analyse new features and tools
Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company
Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
